channel.title: CVE Feed for ua-parser -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ua-parser -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-5243|2024-08-04T08:22:09.077Z -- ua-parser -- uap-core
item.description: uap-core before 0.7.3 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack when processing crafted User-Agent strings. Some regexes are vulnerable to regular expression denial of service (REDoS) due to overlapping capture groups. This allows remote attackers to overload a server by setting the User-Agent header in an HTTP(S) request to maliciously crafted long strings. This has been patched in uap-core 0.7.3.
